{"id":"chatcmpl-660","object":"chat.completion","created":1767598558,"model":"gpt-oss:120b-cloud","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"{"action":"continue","batchFound":true,"newEvidence":[{"pointer":"1.1.1.p39","excerpt":"– Вот видите, сами говорите – жидкость, – усмехнулся Звёздочкин. – Откуда же в Луне взялась пустота, если там была жидкость, садовая вы голова?","reason":"The paragraph includes a spoken line attributed to Звёздочкин, a named individual."},{"pointer":"1.1.1.p40","excerpt":"– Ну, об этом совсем нетрудно догадаться, – невозмутимо ответил Знайка. – Ведь раскалённая жидкость, окружённая твёрдой оболочкой Луны, продолжала остывать, а остывая, она уменьшалась в объёме. Вы, надо полагать, знаете, что каждое вещество, охлаждаясь, уменьшается в объёме?","reason":"The paragraph contains dialogue spoken by Знайка, a named character."},{"pointer":"1.1.1.p41","excerpt":"– Надо полагать, знаю, – сердито буркнул профессор.","reason":"The paragraph features a line spoken by the professor, a stable title tied to a person."}],"progress":"Found three paragraphs mentioning characters in this batch.","needMoreContext":false}","reasoning":"We need to produce JSON with new evidence from this batch. Task: collect all character mentions across the book, each paragraph where a person appears. We have to include named individuals or stable titles. In this batch we have paragraphs with mentions: "Звёздочкин", "Знайка", "профессор". Those are named individuals or titles (professor is a stable title). They are not in recentEvidencePointers list (which includes up to p38). So we add evidence for pointers 1.1.1.p39, p40, p41.

We need excerpt exactly from markdown field. Provide reason: mention of a person. Provide progress summary perhaps.

We need action: continue because maxEvidenceCount 86, currently evidenceCount 26, new evidence length 3 gives 29 <86, so continue.

batchFound true.

Construct JSON accordingly.
